summary: A few batch files to give you the full armor set
descriptionHtml:
Hi there skyrim fanatics and skyrim players,
This little file here just gives you all items from one set to your character*

To use it:
Put this files in you \"skyrim/data\" folder, then, in-game, hit the tilde key (~) and type \"bat (batfilename)\"

Warning: this is a major cheating device!

Bat file names: (the f stands for full)
-Main:
Iron: ironf
Banded Iron: bironf
Steel: steelf (with horned helmet = steelhhf)
Steel plate: steelpf
Scale: scalef
Dwarven: dwarvenf
Orcish: orcishf
Ebony: ebonyf
Daedric: daedricf
Dragonplate/scale: dragonplatef/-scalef
Glass: glassf
Elven: elvenf
Hide: hidef
-Optional:
Added Draugr (ancient nord) on request:
draugrf
Added Nightingale on request: nightingalef
Added Forsworn on request: forswornf

*some armors don\'t really have sets (biron for example)

Comments are welcome, and IF you really miss a set, request it and i\'ll try to make the time to make that aswell. Endorse please :)

P.S. the iron shield isn\'t inculded because of it being too easy to find.
author: jojo4u

files.name: Full Armor Sets bat files 1-1
files.changelogHtml: Put in elven and hide armor
